title: Introducing: Deathcats
body:
While on my daily scour of SoundCloud I stumbled across this little gem which just so happened to come from close to home.

Released over three months ago, _Dreamz_ by Glasgow’s **Deathcats** is three and a half minutes of deliciously fuzzy and hectic production, with one hell of a catchy hook that’ll leave you humming along for days.

Check out _Dreamz_ below:

\[soundcloud url=”https://api.soundcloud.com/tracks/131484430″ params=”auto\_play=false&hide\_related=false&visual=true” width=”100%” height=”450″ iframe=”true” /\]
